onboarding2text: Select your location on Google Maps to find the nearest device you want quickly
onboarding3text: Detect the period of time that you want to rent the device through to let the owner know

about_app_text: Rentr is an app created to help you find what you want to get for just a period of time. It shows you the device you want through searching. After that you can view the results arranged from the nearest to the farthest owner. You can also choose the best price for you. After finding the best option for you, you can send a request to the owner and wait for his approval. By then, you can go to his location and receive the device you have booked.
1st_q: How to add an item for leasing?
1st_a: To add an item for leasing, you should press the "+" button, fill the required information about the item and then press the button "Add item".
2nd_a: To view requests for leasing your items, you have to open "requests" page. By then, you can see all the requests, accept what you want and decline what you want by a click of button.
3rd_a: To request for leasing an item, you should enter the item's page, press the button "Make Request", fill the required data about your request and then press the button "Book now". After that, you will receive an email to tell you if your request was accepted or not. If it is accepted, you should communicate with the owner through a phone call or chatting on whatsapp to complete the process.
no_products_exist_in_this_category: No products exist in this category
